LanguageData.Bullet_Pistol.label: pistol bullet
LanguageData.Gun_Pistol.label: pistol
LanguageData.Gun_Pistol.description: Ancient pattern automatic pistol. Weak and short range, but quick.
LanguageData.Bullet_PumpShotgun.label: shotgun blast
LanguageData.Gun_PumpShotgun.label: pump shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_PumpShotgun.description: Ancient design. Deadly, but short range.
LanguageData.Bullet_SurvivalRifle.label: survival rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_SurvivalRifle.label: survival rifle
LanguageData.Gun_SurvivalRifle.description: Ancient bolt-action rifle. Good range, Good power, low rate of fire.
LanguageData.Bullet_AssaultRifle.label: assault rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_AssaultRifle.label: assault rifle
LanguageData.Gun_AssaultRifle.description: A general-purpose military weapon for field or urban combat. It fires a three-round burst. Good range, low power, high rate of fire.
LanguageData.Bullet_SniperRifle.label: sniper rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_SniperRifle.label: sniper rifle
LanguageData.Gun_SniperRifle.description: Ancient pattern military sniper rifle. Bolt action. Long range, great accuracy and power.
LanguageData.Bullet_MachinePistol.label: Machine pistol bullet
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.label: Machine pistol
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.description: A micro-submachine gun. Short range, low power, high rate of fire. Very quick to aim and fire.
LanguageData.Bullet_HeavySMG.label: heavy SMG bullet
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.label: heavy SMG
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.description: A compact, wide-caliber slug-thrower. Very short range, but it packs a punch and handles quite well.
LanguageData.Bullet_IncendiaryLauncher.label: incendiary bolt
LanguageData.Gun_IncendiaryLauncher.label: incendiary launcher
LanguageData.Bullet_LMG.label: LMG bullet
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.label: LMG
LanguageData.Bullet_ChargeRifle.label: charge shot
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.label: charge rifle
LanguageData.Bullet_Minigun.label: minigun bullet
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.label: minigun
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.description: A multi-barrel machine gun with an extremely high rate of fire. Mechanoid-built.
LanguageData.Bullet_DoomsdayRocket.label: doomsday rocket
LanguageData.Gun_DoomsdayRocket.label: doomsday rocket launcher
LanguageData.Gun_DoomsdayRocket.description: A single-use rocket launcher for quick retribution.
LanguageData.Bullet_Rocket.label: rocket
LanguageData.Gun_TripleRocket.label: triple rocket launcher
LanguageData.Gun_TripleRocket.description: A single-use rocket launcher that fires 3 projectiles in quick succession.
LanguageData.Bullet_ChargeBlasterHeavy.label: charge blaster shot
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeBlasterHeavy.label: heavy charge blaster
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeBlasterHeavy.description: Charged-shot blaster for area suppressive fire. Mechanoid-built.
LanguageData.Bullet_InfernoCannon.label: inferno cannon shell
LanguageData.Gun_InfernoCannon.label: inferno cannon
LanguageData.Bullet_ChargeLance.label: charge lance shot
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeLance.label: charge lance
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeLance.description: Charged-shot rail-assisted lance weapon. Fires a single charged shot at high velocity.
